input.label: Select tcpdump file:
input.populatingSearch: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv| rex field=source "(windows|unix)(\\\\|\\\)(?<source>.*)" |stats count by source

chart.title: NFS Operation over Time
chart.searchString: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv source="*$Source$*" "$IP1$" AND "$IP2$" protocol=NFS | rex "^\w+\s+\d+\,\s+\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+\.\d+\s+\w+\.\s+\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+\t\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\t\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\t\w+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t(?P<nfs_op>\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+)" | timechart span=$Span$ count by nfs_op usenull=f

chart.title: NFS Sum Bytes over Time
chart.searchString: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv source="*$Source$*" "$IP1$" AND "$IP2$" protocol=NFS | timechart span=$Span$ sum(tcp_length) as "SumBytes"

chart.title: NFS Errors over Time
chart.searchString: index=* sourcetype=pcap:csv source="*$Source$*" "$IP1$" AND "$IP2$" protocol=NFS error | rex "^\w+\s+\d+\,\s+\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+\.\d+\s+\w+\.\s+\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+\t\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\t\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\t\w+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t\d+\t(?P<nfs_op>\w+\s+\w+\s+\w+)" | rex "^(?:[^:\n]*:){3}\s+(?P<nfs_error>.+)"|timechart span=$Span$ count by nfs_error usenull=f
